java.lang.Object
  ucare.jaf.common.CObject
      ucare.jaf.database.CDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:

public abstract class CDatabase
extends CObject
implements IDatabase, ILogger

open

public IDatabase open()
이 메소드는 호출하면 CDatabase의 정보를 가지고 DB Connection를 한다.
수정인:ucare
날자: 2004/06/11
수정이유: 속도더 Async방식이 빠르고 안전하다고 함.

sync방식:
   Class.forName ("weblogic.jdbc.pool.Driver").newInstance ();
   conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:weblogic.pool:ecarePool",null);
수정된 Async방식
   Driver myDriver = (Driver)
   Class.forName ("weblogic.jdbc.pool.Driver").newInstance ();
   conn = myDriver.connect ("jdbc:weblogic:pool:ecarePool",null);

Specified by:
open in interface IDatabase
Returns:
Connection 연결된 객체

public IDatabase open(java.lang.String _POOLNAME)
Specified by:
open in interface IDatabase

createQuery

public IQuery createQuery()
 IQuery 객체에 대한 인스턴스를 생성한다.

 Example:
 IQuery qy = BaseDatabase.createQuery();
 qy.open();
 qy.setSQL("select * from emp");
 DataSet ds = qy.select().getDataSet();
 qy.close();

Specified by:
createQuery in interface IDatabase
Returns:
IQuery
